field_edited_text.value:
HXPIANATILO NS
POST OFFICES.

PRINCIPAL PROFESSIONAL AND BUSINESS MEN AND PRODUCERS
Frederick County. Maryland.



1. Frederick City. 9. Middletown. 16. Emmittsburg. 23. Tjamsville. 30. McKinstry’s Mills. | 37. Ladiesburg. 44, Mount Pleasant. 51. Johusville.

2. Hansonville, 10. Bolivar. 17. Double Pipe Creek. | 24. Park Mills. 81. New Market. 38. Walkersville. 45. Jefferson. 52. Middleburg.

8. Buckeystown. 11. Creagerstown. 18. Bridgeport. 25. Libertytown. 32. New London. 39. Georgetown. 46. Lander. 53. Union Bridge.

4. Adamstown. 12. Rocky Ridge. 19. Wolfsville. 26. Linganore. 33. Plummersville. 40. Petersville. 47. Broad Run. 54. Woodyville.

5. Point of Rocks. 13. Graceham. 20. Kllerton. 27. Unionville. 81, Sabillasville. 41. Barry P. O.(Berlin.) 48. Mechanicstown. 55. Plane No. 4.

6. Lime Kiln S\:vn.ch. 14. Le.wmtoyrn. 21. Urbana. 28. Oak Orchard. 35. Foxville. 42, Knoxville. 49. Catoctin Furnace. 56. Mount Airy.

7. Greenfield Mills. 15. Utica Mills. 22, Hyattstown. 29. Sam’s Creek. 36. Woodsborough. 43. Burkittsville. 50. Myersville. 57. Monrovia.

8. Licksville. 58. Fountain Dale, Pa.

PRODUCTIONS.
C. for Corn. Fr. for Fruit. H. for Hay. Hs. for Hogs. 0. for Oats. Po. for Potatoes. Sh. for Sheep. W. for Wheat.
Ctl. for Cattle. Gr. for Grain. Hr. for Horses. M. for Mules. P. for Produce. R. for Rye. S. for Stock. WI. for Wool.
¢ '~ TO ALL WHOM IT MAY CONCERN.

We would most respectfully invite the public generally to examine the cards of the Principal Business Men and Producers of Frederick County, given in our Business Directory, and we cheerfully
recommend them to the public patronage. .



Buckeystown District Directory, No. 1. CREAGERSTOWN DIST.—Continned, | Urbana District Directory, No.7





Frederick District—~Continued.
